record.title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 2720
record.narrative:
REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 2720 -- (House of Representatives - July 23, 2007)

[Page: H8257]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that my name be removed as a cosponsor of H.R. 2720.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from New Jersey?
